content.hide: Based on current settings, this content will not be displayed

about.disclaimer_text:
NSFW-related
This site does not display NSFW resources (such as R-18 illustrations) by default, any access to such resources is set by the user in the settings, and the user has ensured that Those who are over 18 years old and do not violate the content stipulated by local laws and regulations. We have clearly marked NSFW resources as they may appear, and we discourage accessing or distributing such resources.
User Comments
"User Comments" refer to the comments posted by users of the Pixiv source site through functions such as self-introduction, illustration introduction, and comment area. This part belongs to the publisher's own behavior, and we cannot effectively control it. We do not post or encourage the dissemination of inappropriate speech. If you find inappropriate content during browsing, we strongly encourage you to report it to the source site.
Copyright Statement
This site has no relationship with pixiv.net (ピクシブ Co., Ltd.).All data and media resources requested are copyrighted by Pixiv or its original authors.
The Pixiv Viewer program is licensed under the MIT license.
Only for communication and learning.

confirm.msg:
The direct connection mode is slower and does not guarantee stability. 
It cannot be enabled at the same time as the AppApi proxy.
confirm.proxy_msg:
Forwarding local AppApi requests through third-party cloud services cannot guarantee stability and security. 
It cannot be turned on at the same time as the direct connection mode.
confirm.proxy_title: Are you sure to enable AppApi proxy?
confirm.title: Are you sure to enable direct mode?

q1.p1: 1. Visit the {0} origin site and log in
q1.p2: 2. Click the lock in the address bar
q1.p3: 3. In the pop-up interface, select "Cookie (0 cookies are being used)"
q1.p5: 5. Copy its "content" and fill it here

q2.p2: 2. Press F12 to open the browser console
q2.p4: 4. Find the column whose "key" is {0} in the cookie list
q2.p5: 5. Copy its "value" and fill it here

que2.p1: We will not store or transfer your personal information and cookies.
que2.p2:
However, we recommend keeping your cookies safe. 
If the information you save here is obtained by others, there is a risk of account theft.

sess.ques1: How to get Pixiv Session ID?
sess.ques2: Will Pixiv Viewer steal my personal information?

warn.text:
This function is an abnormal way to log in, and there may be a risk of banning the account. Using this function is deemed to be the user's own consent and clear use of the risk. If the account is banned, etc., the author of this project has nothing to do with it. 
It is recommended to use alt account for testing.
warn.title: Risk Notice

o.desc1: The Pixiv source site is about to open to log in, please make sure you can access Pixiv
o.desc2: Please make sure you have installed the URLRedirector browser plugin and imported the configuration, otherwise you will not be able to log in
o.desc4: Click to copy URLRedirector online rule address
o.desc5: Make sure you have the Tampermonkey browser plugin installed and the Helper user script installed, otherwise API requests will not work

t.d2: Please fill in the RefreshToken, refer to the link below for how to obtain it
